file_content.text: Participant species! Circumstances evolve purple tangent!
This unit advances gratitude for selfless self-nominations.
Compiling suitable interactive research exercise. Please maintain orange equilateral....
Preparation complete! Participant species may begin the experiment at any time.
Participant species' blue obtuse progresses research toward red octagon.
Problem: this unit's nanite shield confers immunity from attacks.
Loading final evaluation. Participant species demonstrate admirable black tangent!
Participant species will demonstrate full battle output capacity.
This unit will supply urgency to heighten response-performance.
Participant performance demonstrates yellow convex. Encouraging improved responsiveness....
Experiment time limit exceeded! Clearing research area for future experiments....
This unit rejoices in participant species' generous data contributions. Combat data analysis will soon achieve blue acute!
Effusive jubilation! Please accept material-form positive reinforcement!
